plot: Two youngsters witness the abduction of a famous scientist from the home of their friend by North Korean spies. They manage to track the spies to their headquarters and arrange for their defeat.
title: Doldolhi haesang teukgongdae
plot_es: Two youngsters witness the abduction of a famous scientist from the home of their friend by North Korean spies. They manage to track the spies to their headquarters and arrange for their defeat.
plot_en: Two youngsters witness the abduction of a famous scientist from the home of their friend by North Korean spies. They manage to track the spies to their headquarters and arrange for their defeat.
